mapper.select: /* Manager 로그인 조회 */ SELECT `A_I`.`ADMIN_IDX`, `A_I`.`ADMIN_ID`, `A_I`.`ADMIN_NM`, `A_I`.`ADMIN_EMAIL`, `A_I`.`GRP_ID`, `A_G`.`GRP_NM`, `A_I`.`CMPLX_ID`, `A_I`.`USE_YN`, `A_I`.`DESC`, `A_I`.`REG_DTTM`, `A_I`.`REG_ADMIN_IDX`, `A_I`.`UPD_DTTM`, `A_I`.`UPD_ADMIN_IDX`, `C_E`.`CL_CMPLX_NM` FROM `CL_ADMIN_INFO` AS A_I LEFT JOIN `CL_ADMIN_GRP` AS A_G ON A_I.GRP_ID = A_G.GRP_ID JOIN `COMPLEX_M_EXT`AS C_E ON `A_I`.`CMPLX_ID` = `C_E`.`CMPLX_ID` WHERE `ADMIN_ID` = #{adminId} AND `ADMIN_PW`=SHA2(#{adminPw}, 256) AND `USE_YN` = 'Y'

/* Post에서 이용하는 관리자 목록 조회 */ SELECT `A_I`.`ADMIN_IDX` AS `USR_ID`, `A_I`.`ADMIN_NM` AS `USER_NM`, IFNULL(( SELECT IMAGE_IDX FROM CL_IMAGE_INFO JOIN CL_IMAGE_TYPE ON CL_IMAGE_INFO.PARENT_TYPE = CL_IMAGE_TYPE.TYPE_IDX AND CL_IMAGE_TYPE.TYPE_NM = 'adminprofile' WHERE CL_IMAGE_INFO.DEL_YN = 'N' AND CL_IMAGE_INFO.PARENT_IDX = A_I.ADMIN_IDX ORDER BY IMAGE_IDX DESC LIMIT 1 ), -1) AS `IMAGE_IDX`, `ADMIN_NM` AS `USER_ALIAS`, CL_CMPLX_NM AS `CMPLX_NM` FROM CL_ADMIN_INFO AS A_I JOIN COMPLEX_M AS C ON A_I.CMPLX_ID = C.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS C_E ON C.CMPLX_ID = C_E.CMPLX_ID WHERE A_I.ADMIN_IDX IN
#{item}

/* 관리자 상세 조회 */ SELECT `ADMIN_IDX`, `ADMIN_ID`, `ADMIN_NM`, `ADMIN_EMAIL`, `USE_YN`, A_I.`DESC`, A_I.`REG_DTTM`, A_I.`REG_ADMIN_IDX`, A_I.`UPD_DTTM`, A_I.`UPD_ADMIN_IDX`, A_I.`CMPLX_ID`, (SELECT CMPLX_NM FROM COMPLEX_M WHERE CMPLX_ID = A_I.CMPLX_ID) AS `CMPLX_NM`, A_G.`GRP_ID` AS `GRP_ID`, A_G.`GRP_NM` AS `GRP_NM` FROM CL_ADMIN_INFO AS A_I, CL_ADMIN_GRP AS A_G WHERE A_I.GRP_ID = A_G.GRP_ID AND ADMIN_ID = '${adminId}'
mapper.insert: /* 관리자 등록 */ INSERT INTO CL_ADMIN_INFO( ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW, ADMIN_NM, ADMIN_EMAIL, GRP_ID, USE_YN, `DESC`, REG_ADMIN_IDX, UPD_ADMIN_IDX, CMPLX_ID) VALUES(#{adminId}, SHA2(#{adminPw}, 256), #{adminNm}, #{adminEmail}, #{grpId}, #{useYn}, #{desc}, #{regAdminIdx}, #{regAdminIdx}, #{cmplxId})
